        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>eeee1234-1234-1fff-ffff-ffff00050271#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Gudea ükő szobra. Kr. e. 22. század. Musée du Louvre.</string>
            <string language="en">Gudea's sitting statue, 22th century BC, Musée du Louvre.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sittingstatue Gudeas, 22. Jahrhundert BC, Musée 
du Louvre.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Statue de la séance de Gudea, 22th siècle BC, 
Musée du Louvre.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estátua do assento de Gudea, 22th século BC, 
Musée du Grelha.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Statua di seduta del Gudea, 22th secolo BC, 
Musée du Louvre.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγαλμα συνεδρίασης Gudea, 22th αιώνας Π.Χ., 
Musιe du Louvre.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estatua de la sentada de Gudea, 2ò siglo A.C., 
Musée du Louvre.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Gudea diorit ülő szobra, ölében az általa felépített Éninnu szentély alaprajzával.</string>
            <string language="en">Gudea's sitting statue, with the ground-plan of his Eninnu sanctuary on his lap</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ókori Kelet,   Mezopotámia,   Kr. e. 22. század,   Lagas,   új-sumer,   király,   Gudea,  </string>
            <string language="en">ancient east, Mesopotamia, 22th century BC, Lagas, new Sumerian, king, Gudea</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sittingstatue Gudeas, mit dem Boden-Plan seines Eninnu 
Schongebiets auf seinem Schoß</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Statue de la séance de Gudea, avec le terre-plan de son 
sanctuaire d'Eninnu sur son recouvrement</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estátua do assento de Gudea, com a terra-planta de seu 
sanctuary de Eninnu em seu regaço</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Statua di seduta del Gudea, con il terra-programma del suo
santuario di Eninnu sul suo giro</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγαλμα συνεδρίασης Gudea, με το έδαφος-σχέδιο του 
αδύτου Eninnu του στην περιτύλιξή του</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estatua de la sentada de Gudea, con el tierra-plan de su 
santuario de Eninnu en su regazo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">alter Osten, Mesopotamia, 22. Jahrhundert BC, Lagas, 
neues sumerisches, König, Gudea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est antique, Mesopotamia, 22th siècle BC, Lagas, 
nouveau sumérien, roi, Gudea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leste antigo, Mesopotamia, 22th século BC, Lagas, 
sumerian novo, rei, Gudea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">est antico, Mesopotamia, 22th secolo BC, Lagas, nuovo 
sumerico, re, Gudea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρχαία ανατολή, Μεσοποταμία, 22th αιώνας Π.Χ., Lagas, 
νέος sumerian, βασιλιάς, Gudea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">este antiguo, Mesopotamia, 2ò siglo A.C., Lagas, 
sumerio nuevo, rey, Gudea</string>
          </keyword>
